verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.CountDigit
Verifies the given code by counting the occurrences of a specific digit and comparing it with the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.CountEven
Verifies the given code by counting the even digits and comparing this count with the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.CountRepetitions
Verifies the given code by finding the maximum number of repetitions of any digit and comparing it with the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.EvenSum
Verifies if the sum of the digits of the given code is even, and compares it with the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.Extremum
Verifies the given code by finding the smallest or largest digit, and compares it with the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.MajorityEven
Verifies if the majority of the digits of the given code are even, and compares it with the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.OrderOfDigits
Verifies if the order of digits in the given code matches that of the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.ParityOfDigit
Verifies if the parity of a specific digit in the given code matches that of the same digit in the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.TwinDigits
Verifies if there is a digit appearing exactly twice in both the user's code and the secret code.
verify(Code) - Method in class Model.Validator.Validator
Abstract method to verify a code against the secret code.
